tagline: Get data and update tasks on this project management app.
description: Connect to the Trello Project Management API to get data and update tasks on this project management app. Test an API call and export the code into your app.

events.name: webhookEvent
events.description: This method is called every time a Trello webhook event occurs
steps: Navigate to https://trello.com/app-key to get an API key and generate a token

To access the idModel of your card or board, go to the board or card you want to track within the trello website and add .json to the URL. Ex/ https://trello.com/c/DcqBrqdx/1-target-card.json. You can read more about this process at https://developers.trello.com/get-started/start-building
Navigate to https://rapidapi.com/package/Trello/functions/createWebhook, input your token from step 1, your idModel from step 2, and the following URL: __WEBHOOK_URL__

args.name: token
args.info: Token sent on each message

steps: Navigate to Developer API Keys page (https://trello.com/app-key)
With description on Authorizing a Client page (https://developers.trello.com/authorize) you can generate accessToken
